items.title: Trump Mobile says its first-ever smartphone is delayed, and the government shutdown is to blame
items.description: Trump Mobile "had to pause everything on the FCC side of things" during the shutdown, which is why the golden $499 T1 smartphone won't launch this yea...

items.title: Warren Buffett’s career advice to young professionals is to ‘hang out with people better than you’
items.description: “If this gives you a little temporary unpopularity with your peer group, the hell with 'em,” Buffett’s former business partner Charlie Munger added.

items.title: Seafood thieves snatch $400,000 of lobster, plus oysters and crabs, in round of New England robberies
items.description: Imagine the buffet. Forty-thousand oysters, lobster worth $400,000 and a cache of crabmeat all were stolen in separate incidents within weeks of each ...

items.title: Zohran Mamdani to get sworn in twice—once underground at abandoned Subway station and once before freezing block party
items.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James, a political ally and notable foe of President Donald Trump, will administer the oath of office.

items.title: Strange political bedfellows not that strange in the season of the new nihilism
items.description: The worry is that a national Depression might catch up to us, but the real problem lies with the national depression.
